page.title: 07A family weekend in Marnhull
page.content: SATURDAY is very much a family shopping day often at a nearby town.Dad helps mum with the purchases in the supermarket.Some dads work on Saturday. As many mothers work, Saturday is the only day they can shop.Few men in this area visit a place of organised sport,but some watch it on TV in the afternoon.Much TV is watched at night especially films,mostly American. SUNDAY.Very few go to any place of worship.Most get up later than usual. Mother cooks the dinner while dad does odd jobs.Children watch TV or a video, or play with friends.All return for a cooked midday meal.Any visiting of relatives is done in the afternoon. Some visit the sea in the summer.Women who work often do their washing and housework on Sunday.Most watch TV or video in the evening.
